titles.title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to convey a certain United States Courthouse in Jacksonville, Florida, to the city of Jacksonville, Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/20/2001--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of General Services to convey specified real property located at 311 West Monroe Street in Jacksonville, Florida, including the U.S. Courthouse building, to the City of Jacksonville for use as a public administration building or for other public purposes.
